sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a new security list for the specified VCN.

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the Compartment.
  • Network ID -The OCID of the VCN.
  • Display Name -A user-friendly name.
  • Egress Security Rules -Rules for allowing egress IP packets.
  • Ingress Security Rules -Rules for allowing ingress IP packets.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Security List ID -The security list's Oracle Cloud ID (OCID).
  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the Compartment.
  • Network Id -The OCID of the VCN.
  • Display Name -A user-friendly name.
  • Egress Security Rules -Rules for allowing egress IP packets.
  • Ingress Security Rules -Rules for allowing ingress IP packets.
  • Lifecycle state -The security list's current state.
  • Time Created -The date and time the security list was created
  • Freeform Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • Defined Tags -Defined tags for this resource.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates a new security list for the specified VCN.

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the Compartment.
  • Network ID -The OCID of the VCN.
  • Display Name -A user-friendly name.
  • Egress Security Rules -Rules for allowing egress IP packets.
  • Ingress Security Rules -Rules for allowing ingress IP packets.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Security List ID -The security list's Oracle Cloud ID (OCID).
  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the Compartment.
  • Network Id -The OCID of the VCN.
  • Display Name -A user-friendly name.
  • Egress Security Rules -Rules for allowing egress IP packets.
  • Ingress Security Rules -Rules for allowing ingress IP packets.
  • Lifecycle state -The security list's current state.
  • Time Created -The date and time the security list was created
  • Freeform Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • Defined Tags -Defined tags for this resource.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
